channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road surface issues, 27th April
item.description:
From train station all the way up to St Georgeâ€™s Road there are multiple pot holes, but not only just that the whole surface of the road is uneven, the whole tarmac is damaged and ruined. At some point the council really needs to start considering redoing the whole road instead of keep messing around and doing little repair in couple of spots and leaving the rest of the road. My car and others gets ruined every day driving through this road, it needs proper fixing. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 196, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wasting Money, 26th April
item.description:
Potholes between 119 & 117 have been ignored, potholes outside 121 have been patched. So the potholes that have been ignored do have white lines sprayed around them, but if left much longer will wear away. Now, to me it seem an extreme waste of money to mobilise a crew, only to fix part of the problem. A significant amount of cost must come in arrangement deployment, this will need to be done again. It shows poor planning and and a blatant disregard for tax payers money. What a disgrace!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 102, Caernarvon Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep & wide potholes opposite busy school, 26th April
item.description:
Deep & wide potholes opposite busy Woodmancote School ....at intersection of main Station Rd & Collyberry Rd housing estate in Woodmancote - main way in / out of Woodmancote to Bishops Clve & to north / south A435 - Many cars park Collyberry Rd during school drop off / pick up - And many pedestrians too / cyclists too. Rds supposed to be monitored & inspected regularly. These potholes are ages / years old getting worse. Needs fixing asap before car / pedestrain / cyclist has accident. Thanku.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Collyberry Road, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple deep / wide / long potholes, 26th April
item.description:
Cheltenham Rd, Bishops Cleeve....multiple deep / wide / long potholes ... from Smiths Industries GEC Aerospace roundabout ....along Cheltenham Rd ....to Stoke Rd roundabout Bishops Clve community hall. Potholes needs fixing asap - Been there far too long & worsening - Rd really needs resurfacing - It's main way into / out of Bishops Clve & shops / facilities / supermarkets / petrol from A345 & Racecourse traffic & tourists & increasing new build homes population. A435 around Racecourse to Smiths Industries GEC Aerospace ....has been resurfaced & being widened with cycle track - That Cheltenham Rd into Bishops Clve off that roundabout needs all multiple potholes fixed or resurfaced asap. Highways supposed to have regular inspections. This should have been done ages / years ago... to avoid cyclist, car & pedestrian accidents / injuries / damage. Thanku.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
